description: Chad Hunt loves showing off his lean and toned body in front of the cameras, and when he's on Fire Island his huge cock can barely hide in his Speedo suit. See what he's up to with the other gay pornstars of 'Fire Island Cruising 2' as they prepare and film their scenes! All of these guys shouldn't even waste their time wearing swim gear -- and thankfully, they don't!
title: The 'Fire Island Cruising 2' Pornstars Behind the Scenes
